data.subject: Fading Like A Flower (Every Time You Leave)
data.lyric:
In a time where the sun descends alone
 I ran a long long way from home
 To find a heart that's made

data.subject: It Must Have Been Love (영화 `귀여운 여인`)
data.lyric:
it must have been love but it's over now
 
 Lay a whisper on my pillow
 Leave the winter on the grou
